type.name: org.gradle.language.nativeplatform.HeaderExportingSourceSet
type.description: A source set that exposes headers

method.name: getExportedHeaders
method.description: The headers as a directory set.

method.name: getImplicitHeaders
method.description: The headers that are private to this source set and implicitly available. These are not explicitly made available for compilation.

property.name: exportedHeaders
property.description: The headers as a directory set.

property.name: implicitHeaders
property.description: The headers that are private to this source set and implicitly available. These are not explicitly made available for compilation.
